other_tests.findings: Extensive diverticulosis in the descending and sigmoid colon. Two adjacent inflamed diverticula in the proximal sigmoid colon with surrounding fat stranding and fascial thickening. No focal fluid collection or free air. Accompanying reactive lymph node enlargement without pathological lymphadenopathy. Mild basilar atelectasis noted on lung bases. Normal liver attenuation with tiny segment II hypodensity. Normal kidneys, gallbladder, pancreas, spleen, and adrenal glands.
